data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tshernyshev, Sergei E. (2015): A new species of soft-winged flower beetles of the genus Platyebaeus Wittmer, 1995 (Coleoptera, Cleroidea, Malachiidae) from Philippines. Zootaxa 3941 (2): 289-293, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3941.2.9
